price: ወደ ሶላትም በጠራችሁ ጊዜ (ጥሪይቱን) መሳለቂያና መጫወቻ አድርገው ይይዟታል፡፡ ይህ እነርሱ የማያውቁ ሕዝቦች በመኾናቸው ነው፡፡
arabic: وَإِذَا نَادَيۡتُمۡ إِلَى ٱلصَّلَوٰةِ ٱتَّخَذُوهَا هُزُوٗا وَلَعِبٗاۚ ذَٰلِكَ بِأَنَّهُمۡ قَوۡمٞ لَّا يَعۡقِلُونَ

version.title: Amharic translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Amharic by Muhammad Sadeq and Muhammad Ath-Thany Habib. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: wa-idhā nādaytum ilā al-ṣalati ittakhadhūhā huzuwan walaʿiban dhālika bi-annahum qawmun lā yaʿqilūna
